gazelle: Rules [a1 a2] defined in %WORKSPACEPATH% create a cyclic dependency between sources [a1.h a2.h], they would be merged into a single rule 'a1'. To prevent automatic merging of rules set `# gazelle:cc_group_unit_cycles warn`
gazelle: Rules [c d] defined in %WORKSPACEPATH% create a cyclic dependency between sources [c.cc c.h d.cc d.h], they would be merged into a single rule 'c'. To prevent automatic merging of rules set `# gazelle:cc_group_unit_cycles warn`
